meanings.sent1: She was glunching at the rainy weather.
meanings.sent2: He always starts glunching when he doesn't get his way.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed to be glunching at the lack of treats.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds overhead seemed to be glunching down at the city below.
meanings.sent5: Her glunching face made it clear she was not in the mood.

meanings.sent1: His glunching was hard to miss during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The child's glunching made it clear she was upset.
meanings.sent3: The dog's glunching was so exaggerated, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The painting captured the essence of glunching perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher could see the glunching on the student's face.
